hanzi-su-wiki:
吉

Значения

Удача, счастье, поздравление

Мнемоника

  • Речь 口 мудрого самурая 士. Делай, как он сказал, и будешь удачлив.

  • "Самурай 士 кричит 口 'удачи!'."

Варианты

heisig_chinese_memo: If a samurai gives you a kiss (mouth) instead of slicing you, then consider it lucky...
heisig_story: Here we see a samurai standing on a street with an open mouth, which people walk up to and look down deep inside of for good luck.
koohiiStory1: The samurai´s wife gives him a (uhum) before battle for good luck.
koohiiStory2: A true samurai gentleman will always mouth, "Good luck" to his opponents before a match.
jp_example_words: 不吉(ふきつ): ominous, sinister, bad luck, ill omen, inauspiciousness
jp_readingExamples: 吉日 (きちじつ), 吉例 (きちれい), 大吉 (だいきち)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The good luck radical and the good luck kanji are the same!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: For good luck, you keep special kits (きつ) in your kitchen (きち). These kitchen kits contain good luck charms.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Your good luck kitchen kits have charms that say things like, "good food," "good company," and "good luck not cutting off your fingers with kitchen knives."

humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle has two glyphs. The first glyph is from ◎ from "口". The upper pictogram is unknown. One is like Goubing, which is a bronze ge, which means solidity (Yu Shengwu). Qian, Li Xueqin), jade is a sacrifice, a thing of auspiciousness, so " good luck " means auspiciousness. The second type of font is from " shi " to " kou ", and " shi " is like the shape of axe. The ancient jade axe was used as a ritual tool and was a symbol of royal and military power. It was owned by tribal chiefs, so " good luck" was extended from " shi " to have auspicious meaning.

Bronze inscriptions inherited the second form of oracle bone inscriptions, from " shi " to " mouth ". In the early days, the " shi " in the inscriptions still retained the axe shape.

Jia Jin inscription means auspicious and auspicious, well-known clock: "Yongdong (end) in auspicious", Shikui's father Ding: "Use the eyebrows to live the life of Huangqi and Jikang." Bronze script is also used as the name of the person and the name of the chronology. "Chu Ji" means "Chu Gan Ji Ri" (Wang Yinzhi). It is calculated on the basis of ten dry days. Any day from the first to the tenth of each month can be called It is "Chu Ji". The ancients believed that the first thing was good and good, so the first dry day was regarded as the good day of the month (Huang Shengzhang). "Auspicious gold" means hard bronze. Prince Wuding: "Choose its lucky gold."

"Said Wen": "Auspicious, good. From Shikou."
humanum_short_description_en: Jia Jin inscriptions from " shi " from " mouth ", " shi " is like an axe, representing authority and dignity, and by extension it means auspiciousness.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文有兩種字形，第一種字形從◎從「口」，上部象形不明，一說象勾兵，即青銅戈，有堅固之意（于省吾），一說象玉圭之形（勞榦、李學勤），玉為祭品，為祥瑞之物，故「吉」有祥瑞之意。第二種字形從「士」從「口」，「士」象斧鉞之形。古代玉斧用作禮器，是王權、軍權的象徵，由部族酋長擁有，故「吉」從「士」引申有吉祥之意。

　　金文上承甲骨文第二種字形，從「士」從「口」，早期金文「士」仍保留斧形，後期線條化而失斧鉞之形。

　　甲金文表示吉祥、吉利，井人鐘：「永冬(終)于吉」，師奎父鼎：「用匄眉壽黃耇吉康」。金文又用作人名和紀日名稱，「初吉」即「初干吉日」（王引之），指以十天干來計算，每月第一日至第十日中的任何一天，都可稱為「初吉」。古人以為第一的事物為吉善，因此把第一個干日視為月之吉日（黃盛璋）。「吉金」表示堅硬的青銅，王子午鼎：「擇其吉金」。

　　《說文》：「吉，善也。从士口。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「士」從「口」，「士」象斧鉞，代表權威、尊貴，引申表示吉祥。

甲骨文有兩種字形，第一種字形從◎從「 口 」，上部象形不明，一說象勾兵，即青銅戈，有堅固之意（于省吾），一說象玉圭之形（勞榦、李學勤），玉為祭品，為祥瑞之物，故「 吉 」有祥瑞之意。第二種字形從「 士 」從「 口 」，「 士 」象斧鉞之形。古代玉斧用作禮器，是王權、軍權的象徵，由部族酋長擁有，故「 吉 」從「 士 」引申有吉祥之意。 金文上承甲骨文第二種字形，從「 士 」從「 口 」，早期金文「 士 」仍保留斧形，後期線條化而失斧鉞之形。 甲金文表示吉祥、吉利，井人鐘：「永冬(終)于吉」，師奎父鼎：「用匄眉壽黃耇吉康」。金文又用作人名和紀日名稱，「初吉」即「初干吉日」（王引之），指以十天干來計算，每月第一日至第十日中的任何一天，都可稱為「初吉」。古人以為第一的事物為吉善，因此把第一個干日視為月之吉日（黃盛璋）。「吉金」表示堅硬的青銅，王子午鼎：「擇其吉金」。 《說文》：「吉，善也。从士口。」
Oracle has two glyphs. The first glyph is from ◎ from " 口". The upper pictogram is unknown. One is like Goubing, which is a bronze ge, which means solidity (Yu Shengwu). Qian, Li Xueqin), jade is a sacrifice, a thing of auspiciousness, so " good luck" means auspiciousness. The second type of font is from " shi" to " kou", and " shi" is like the shape of axe. The ancient jade axe was used as a ritual tool and was a symbol of royal and military power. It was owned by tribal chiefs, so " good luck" was extended from " shi" to have auspicious meaning. Bronze inscriptions inherited the second form of oracle bone inscriptions, from " shi" to " mouth". In the early days, the " shi" in the inscriptions still retained the axe shape. Jia Jin inscription means auspicious and auspicious, well-known clock: "Yongdong (end) in auspicious", Shikui's father Ding: "Use the eyebrows to live the life of Huangqi and Jikang." Bronze script is also used as the name of the person and the name of the chronology. "Chu Ji" means "Chu Gan Ji Ri" (Wang Yinzhi). It is calculated on the basis of ten dry days. Any day from the first to the tenth of each month can be called It is "Chu Ji". The ancients believed that the first thing was good and good, so the first dry day was regarded as the good day of the month (Huang Shengzhang). "Auspicious gold" means hard bronze. Prince Wuding: "Choose its lucky gold." "Said Wen": "Auspicious, good. From Shikou."

吉字的基本解释

吉
jí
好，有利的，幸福的，与“凶”相对：吉利。吉祥。逢凶化吉。吉光片羽（喻残存的珍贵的文物）。
吉利的日子：择吉。
善，贤，美：吉人（善良，有才德的人）。吉人天相。
中国吉林省的简称：吉剧。
姓。
凶

吉字的起名意思

：是指吉祥；吉利，与“凶”相对；有利的，幸福的，也有善，贤，美的意思。

Lucky
Basic explanation of words
Lucky
jí
Good, favorable, happy, and "fierce" opposite: auspicious. auspicious. Every evil turns auspicious. Ji Guang Pianyu (Yu's remaining precious cultural relics).
Auspicious days: choose auspicious.
Kind, virtuous, beautiful: Ji people (kind, talented people). Good luck.
Abbreviation for Jilin Province of China: Jiju Opera.
name.
fierce
Lucky
Chinese dictionary definition of words
Lucky
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
Lucky
Source glyph
Lucky
Name meaning
: Refers to auspiciousness; auspiciousness, as opposed to "fierceness"; beneficial and happy, but also good, virtuous, and beautiful.
jí
I сущ.
1) счастье; удача; счастливый; удачливый
凶多吉少 бед много — счастья мало
万事大吉 большой удачи Вам во всех делах (новогоднее пожелание)
2) счастливая примета; счастливый, благоприятствующий, благоприятный
令月吉日 счастливый месяц, благоприятствующий день
3) празднество (особенно: свадьба); свадебный, брачный; праздничный
4) * новолуние
月吉 первое число месяца (ст. ст.), новолуние
5) * хороший, добродетельный
II словообр.
гига (десятичная приставка)
III собств.
1) геогр. (сокр. вм. 吉林) провинция Цзилинь (Гирин)
2) геогр. (сокр. вм. 吉林) город Цзилинь (Гирин)
吉长铁路 Цзилинь (Гирин)-Чанчуньская железная дорога
3) геогр. (сокр. вм. 吉尔吉斯斯坦) Кыргызстан
4) Цзи (фамилия)

吉

Значения

Удача, счастье, поздравление

Мнемоника

  • Речь 口 мудрого самурая 士. Делай, как он сказал, и будешь удачлив.

  • "Самурай 士 кричит 口 'удачи!'."

Варианты

𠮷

Radicals: 吉  (good-luck)
Meaning Mnemonic
The good luck radical and the good luck kanji are the same!
Know your radicals, yo!
Reading Mnemonic
For good luck, you keep special kits (きつ) in your kitchen (きち). These kitchen kits contain good luck charms.
Your good luck kitchen kits have charms that say things like, "good food," "good company," and "good luck not cutting off your fingers with kitchen knives."
